scripts.dev:web:https:init: pnpm run dev:web:https:setup && pnpm run dev:web:https
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n WEB,API,DOCS,INDEXER "pnpm --filter web dev" "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter docs dev" "pnpm --filter @repo/indexer dev"
scripts.dev:all:http: ENFORCE_HTTPS=0 LOCAL_HTTPS_REDIRECT=0 concurrently -k -n WEB,API,DOCS,INDEXER "pnpm --filter web dev" "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter docs dev" "pnpm --filter @repo/indexer dev"
scripts.dev:all:https: concurrently -k -n WEB,API,DOCS,INDEXER "pnpm --filter web dev:https" "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter docs dev:https" "pnpm --filter @repo/indexer dev"
scripts.dev:all:https:init: pnpm run dev:web:https:setup && pnpm run dev:all:https
